summary: While Unarmed, punch with right and left hands just by hitting the Right hand equip slot and block with left hand equip slot.
descriptionHtml:
[b]20-06-16 - Added Alternative version without blocking, just alternating right and left punches in Right hand equip slot, and left punch only on left hand equip slot. For those with any compatibility issues, bugs or just find unarmed blocking awkward.


Unarmed - Hand to hand animation Oblivion Style[/b]

No fist Weapons required.

This little Mod makes unarmed attacks with Left Mouse button alternate between right and left punch animations, and now with the Right mouse button you can block, kind like it used to be in Oblivion.

It only changes how game deals with unarmed animations, no damage or any other rating is modified.

Also, blocking while unarmed uses 1h Blocking animations, wich are kind of weird with bare hands, so i recomend using 5poiler´s Blocking animation pack: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64510/? , it has better fitting blocking animations. 

[b]How It works:[/b]

Right Hand Empty + Left Hand Empty = Right Hand slot alternate between Right and left Punches / Left Hand Slot Block
Right Hand Empty + Shield = Right Hand slot alternate between Right and left Punches / Left Hand Slot Block with Shield
Right Hand Empty + Weapon = Right Hand slot alternate between Right and left Punches / Left Hand Slot Attack with equiped Left Weapon
Right Hand Empty + Spell = Right Hand slot alternate between Right and left Punches / Left Hand Slot Use equiped Spell

[b]Compatibility:[/b]

Should be compatible with anything, since it only changes how the game deals with unarmed animations.

This is my first Mod, so any positive or negative feedback is appreciated.
author: claudiosf
